item.title: New work laptop
item.author: cpbotha@cpbotha.net (Charl P. Botha)
item.description: I think I just might have found my next work laptop. Imagine the surprised and definitely jealous expressions as you plonk down your new Hello Kitty laptop at that next power meeting or important research discussion. Marvelous! Click on the image for the accompanying site (found via engadget.com).
item.content:encoded:
I think I just might have found my next work laptop. Imagine the surprised and definitely jealous expressions as you plonk down your new Hello Kitty laptop at that next power meeting or important research discussion. Marvelous!

Click on the image for the accompanying site (found via engadget.com).
